title: Replication data for: Measuring Discounting without Measuring Utility
creator: Arthur E. Attema
description: We introduce a new method to measure the temporal discounting of money. Unlike preceding methods, our method requires neither knowledge nor measurement of utility. It is easier to implement, clearer to subjects, and requires fewer measurements than existing methods.
subject: C91 Design of Experiments: Laboratory, Individual
D11 Consumer Economics: Theory
D12 Consumer Economics: Empirical Analysis
D91 Micro-Based Behavioral Economics: Role and Effects of Psychological, Emotional, Social, and Cognitive Factors on Decision Making
